description: This file defines the DetailsActivity class responsible for displaying detailed content information within an Android application. It hosts a ContentDetailsFragment and provides a public method to create an intent to start this activity with a specific ContentItem.

classes.name: DetailsActivity
classes.description: Android activity hosting ContentDetailsFragment, displaying content details, and providing a static method to create intents to launch this activity with a specified ContentItem.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up the view container, and loads ContentDetailsFragment with the ContentItem passed via intent.

methods.name: createIntent
methods.description: Static method to generate an Intent for starting DetailsActivity with a given ContentItem.
